mapper.select: select count(*) TodayCnt from visitlog where to_date(vDate,'yyyy/mm/dd')=to_date(sysdate,'yyyy/mm/dd')

select * from ( select a.*,rownum rnum from ( select to_date(vdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') regdate, NVL(count(*),0) cnt from visitLog group by to_date(vdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') order by regdate desc )a ) where rnum>=#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}
select NVL(count(*),0) datecnt from (select NVL(count(*),0) cnt from visitLog group by to_date(vdate,'YYYY-MM-DD'))
